notes: Make an additional @unit_cavalry/scout.png@. Send 4 @unit_worker/villager.png@ on @resource/sheep.png@.

2 @unit_worker/villager.png@ build @building_rus/hunting-cabin.png@ (near @resource/resource_wood.png@), @building_economy/house.png@ & @building_economy/lumber-camp.png@, then on @resource/resource_wood.png@.
Send both @unit_cavalry/scout.png@ to enemy territory to hunt @resource/deer.png@ and @resource/wolf.png@.
Rally next @unit_worker/villager.png@ on @resource/sheep.png@. Research @technology_economy/wheelbarrow.png@.
Produce 1-2 @unit_cavalry/scout.png@ from @building_rus/hunting-cabin.png@ (scout your base). Bring back @resource/sheep.png@.
Continue rallying @unit_worker/villager.png@ on @resource/sheep.png@. Build 1 @building_economy/house.png@ with 1 @unit_worker/villager.png@ from @resource/resource_wood.png@.
Once done, @unit_cavalry/scout.png@ harrass opponent @unit_worker/villager.png@ (typically on @resource/resource_gold.png@).
Build @landmark_rus/the-golden-gate.png@ with 6 @unit_worker/villager.png@ from @resource/resource_food.png@, then to @resource/boar.png@.
Keep 4 @unit_worker/villager.png@ on @resource/resource_food.png@, the others go to @resource/resource_wood.png@.
Continue rallying @unit_worker/villager.png@ on @resource/resource_wood.png@. Build a @building_rus/wooden-fortress.png@ on @building_economy/lumber-camp.png@.

Send 6 @unit_worker/villager.png@ from @landmark_rus/the-golden-gate.png@ and 2 (from @resource/sheep.png@ or @resource/resource_wood.png@ if lacking @resource/resource_food.png@) to @resource/boar.png@.

Kill @resource/boar.png@ (with @unit_cavalry/scout.png@ and @unit_worker/villager.png@) close to @resource/resource_wood.png@. Build @building_rus/wooden-fortress.png@ and @building_rus/hunting-cabin.png@.

Build 1 @building_economy/house.png@ & 1 @building_military/stable.png@. Send @unit_worker/villager.png@ from @resource/sheep.png@ to @resource/resource_wood.png@ (after starting @resource/boar.png@).
Research @technology_economy/double-broadaxe.png@. Sell @resource/resource_wood.png@ with @landmark_rus/the-golden-gate.png@ for @resource/resource_gold.png@.
Build up to 4 @building_military/archery-range.png@ and 1 @building_technology/blacksmith.png@. Produce @unit_cavalry/knight-2.png@ & @unit_infantry/archer-2.png@ to attack/defend.

Against many @unit_cavalry/knight-2.png@ (like @civilization_flag/CivIcon-FrenchAoE4_spacing.png@), add @building_military/barracks.png@ for @unit_infantry/spearman-1.png@ (less @building_military/archery-range.png@).
Continue rallying @unit_worker/villager.png@ on @resource/resource_wood.png@, up to 18, then on @resource/sheep.png@.
Next @unit_worker/villager.png@ go to @resource/sheep.png@, up to 13-15, then @resource/resource_wood.png@ again.
Research @technology_military/steeled-arrow.png@, @technology_military/siege-engineering.png@ or other techs based on the match.
Use @unit_cavalry/scout.png@, @unit_cavalry/knight-2.png@, @unit_infantry/archer-2.png@ and @unit_siege/battering-ram.png@ to attack.
For @age/age_3.png@, pull 20 @unit_worker/villager.png@ from @resource/resource_wood.png@ to @resource/resource_food.png@ (10) & @resource/resource_gold.png@ (10).
